amendment.description: Amendment sought to exempt independent establishments from the requirements of the bill.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 6 printed in Part B of House Report 114-388 to exempt independent establishments from the requirements of the bill.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Cummings amendment (A006) Failed by recorded vote: 172 - 244 (Roll no. 14).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Cummings amendment (A006) Failed by recorded vote: 172 - 244 (Roll no. 14).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A006) offered by Mr. Cummings.
